subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ぎょう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5}}

subSections.title: Noun
Proverbs
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|業は勤むるに精しく嬉しむに荒む|ぎょう は つっとむる に くわしく たのしむ に すさむ}}: study hard and become wise, slack off and stay dumb
* {{ja-r|業は道に依って賢し|ぎょう は みち に よって かしこし}}: the ones doing it are the experts
* {{ja-r|業を創め、統を垂る|ぎょう を はじめ、とう を たる}}: a man of virtue builds up his skills, and then passes them on to those who come after

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ごう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ごう|hhira=ごふ}}

# {{lb|ja|Buddhism|sort=こう'}} [[karma]]
# [[sin]], [[misdeed]]
# abbreviation of {{l|ja|業腹|tr=''gōhara''}}: [[resentment]], [[resentful]]

subSections.title: Idioms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|業が深い|ごう が ふかい}}: to be deeply [[sinful]]
* {{ja-r|業が煮える|ごう が にえる}}, {{ja-r|業が煎れる|ごう が いれる}}, {{ja-r|業が湧く|ごう が わく}}: to be [[irritated]], to be [[annoyed]], to get [[angry]]
* {{ja-r|業を煮やす|ごう を にやす}}, {{ja-r|業を沸かす|ごう を わかす}}: to [[lose one's temper]], to [[fly off the handle]]
* {{ja-r|業に沈む|ごう に しずむ}}: to [[sink]] into [[sin]] and [[despair]]
* {{ja-r|業の風|ごう の かぜ}}: the powerful [[wind]]s of [[sin]] that blow in [[hell]]
* {{ja-r|業の秤|ごう の はかり}}: a mythological [[scale]] that weighs the sins of the dead
* {{ja-r|業を曝す|ごう を さらす}}: to endure [[shame]] in this life as karma for sins committed in a previous life

subSections.title: Proverbs
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|業によりて果を引く|ごう に よりて か を ひく}}: [[you reap what you sow]], [[what goes around comes around]]

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|わざ}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=わざ|-}}.  Found in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', completed some time after 759 CE.<ref>{{RQ:Manyoshu|4|721}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man4Yos.html#721 here]</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|わざ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|わざ}}

# a [[work]] of great [[significance]] or [[intent]]
# an [[intentional]] [[act]] or [[action]]
# {{lb|ja|Buddhism|sort=わざ}} a Buddhist [[memorial service]]
# one's [[job]], [[occupation]], [[profession]]
# a [[matter]] or [[affair]]: implies a [[complication]] or [[problem]]
#: {{ja-usex|容%易な'''業'''ではありませんよ。|よう%い な '''わざ''' で は ありません よ。|It's no easy '''matter''', I tell you.}}
# a [[technique]], a [[means]] of doing something
#: {{ja-usex|'''業'''を磨く|'''わざ''' を みがく|polish one's '''technique'''}}
# a [[move]] or [[technique]] in [[sumo]], [[judo]], [[kendo]], or other competitive activity
# a [[disaster]], [[misfortune]], [[calamity]]
